title: Highlight
description: A highlight for the journal, press or preprint server, or at the site level. Each highlight is a text, image and URL and may be used by a theme to show a slider or similar highlighted items.

_href.description: The URL to this highlight in the REST API.

contextId.description: The journal, press or preprint server ID, or null when the highlight is for the site level.

description.description: The short text for this highlight.

image.description: The image to show with this highlight.

sequence.description: The order in which this highlight should be shown. Lower numbers appear first.

title.description: The title or headline for this highlight.

url.description: The URL where this highlight should send the user when they click on it.

urlText.description: The text to use with the button or link to the URL.
